divs: Sighting Detailspeace and love to everyone. tim here we go. being from chicago i love looking at the night sky. it was about three am tuesday march 11 2008 up near delevan lake. i had moved myself outside with my dog to look at the stars. aside from the chemtrail being sprayed (yes at 3am) i saw on the horizon some lights that looked like planes on their flightpaths. there was another light that glowed ivory in color and i noticed it was going at a steady rate and then slowing down. this happened maybe three times. when i realized that this was nothing i had ever seen before due to the missing characteristic saftey lights on the wings, etc and the movement patterns the object then more than tripled in size as it glowed a purple color. then it was gone. well i was blown away here i had a real ufo experience. the following day at sunset yea a stunning chemtrail sunset i parked my vehicle close to a field and watched. as i watched a plane flying northeast and wondered where the object and its living passengers might be, what looked like a gray plane on a similar path as the first moved closer to where i was parked. instantly perhaps telepathically i recognized the object not as a plane. and just like that the object glowed and then another time with the same intensity in succession an orangereddishviolet color. so i turned to secure my vehicle and bring my dog to the center of the field. in nervous excitement i rushed and as i turned to move closer to the object it was moving away from me and disappeared into the "clouds". allright the third was saturday 15march o8 and driving back to chicago on hwy 50 driving east i noticed a light among the stars that seemed different. by this time i had made the walmart run to get binoculars. i saw a light that was vibrating with color from white to red green blue some orange and purple and moving randomly forward backward up down and more. a state trooper came up to check on why i was there and i handed him the binoculars to see for himself. his take was an airplane in a holding pattern. let me finish by stating that for me this experience was nonthreatnening in fact loving and peaceful. trusting this will benefit us all as we travel together on this exciting path, shaping the story of our times. i bless you and thank you all. in truth peace love and joy ana
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: light moved and slowed down and resumed rate then glowed bright purple/red
trends: There have been no other sightings in delevan wisconsin
This sighting has never been favorited.
